column5: Congrats!!!!   Time to go spend some $$$ on a steelhead setup

Congrats!  I'll always remember my first as well.  I find walking the tribs and drifting very relaxing.  The first fall/winter/early spring I did it, I actually lost 10 pounds over that time period, instead of gaining 10 like I did in the past!!
Nice job!  I just got some steelhead equipment and can't wait to try it out.
cool way to go remember you dont need all this fancy crap to catch bows, ive caught thousands on 2 split shot and hook and a roe bag
